books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The final installment of the trilogy that includes “Winter in Paradise” and “What Happens in Paradise.”
books.name: TROUBLES IN PARADISE

books.author: by Tana French
books.description: After a divorce, a former Chicago police officer resettles in an Irish village where a boy goes missing.
books.name: THE SEARCHER

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
books.name: THE RETURN

books.author: by Rumaan Alam
books.description: A family vacation in an isolated part of Long Island is thrown into confusion when the home’s owners return claiming New York City is having a blackout.
books.name: LEAVE THE WORLD BEHIND

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: In a prequel to “The Pillars of the Earth,” a boatbuilder, a Norman noblewoman and a monk live in England under attack by the Welsh and the Vikings.
books.name: THE EVENING AND THE MORNING

books.author: by Alice Hoffman
books.description: In a prequel to “Practical Magic,” Maria Owens invokes a curse that will haunt her family in Salem, Mass.
books.name: MAGIC LESSONS

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After surviving a plane crash, a death doula travels to Egypt to reconnect with an old flame who is an archaeologist.
books.name: THE BOOK OF TWO WAYS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The sixth book in the Memory Man series. Decker and Jamison investigate a murder in a North Dakota town in a fracking boom.
books.name: WALK THE WIRE

books.author: by James Patterson and J.D. Barker
books.description: A detective and an F.B.I. agent are baffled by a cross-country killing spree.
books.name: THE COAST-TO-COAST MURDERS

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.
books.name: THE GUEST LIST

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: When America’s power grid is shut down, Mitch Rapp goes after a cyber terrorist.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: TOTAL POWER
